sentences.en: All entrants must warrant that their entry is entirely their own work.
sentences.cn: 所有参赛者必须保证其参赛作品完全是自己创作的。

sentences.en: Although not ideal, this attitude is not entirely destructive.
sentences.cn: 这种态度虽然不够理想，但还不至于消极透顶。

sentences.en: Any mistakes are entirely down to us.
sentences.cn: 任何过错全是我们造成的。

sentences.en: Fraud is an entirely different matter.
sentences.cn: 欺诈完全是另外一回事。

sentences.en: Her reasons were not entirely clear.
Mars has an insubstantial atmosphere, consisting almost entirely of carbon dioxide.
sentences.cn: 火星的大气层极其稀薄，几乎全部由二氧化碳构成。

sentences.en: My line of work is entirely unrelated to politics.
sentences.cn: 我的职业与政治完全无关。

sentences.en: Once the damage is done, even modern surgery can't undo it entirely.
sentences.cn: 伤害一旦造成，即使是现代外科手术也无法将其完全消除。

sentences.en: She claimed the unemployment figures were not entirely unexpected.
sentences.cn: 她声称失业率并非完全出乎意料。

sentences.en: The doctor's verdict was that he was entirely healthy.
sentences.cn: 医生的结论是他完全健康。

sentences.en: The downstairs of the two little houses had been entirely refashioned.
sentences.cn: 两栋小楼的底层已经彻底翻修过。

sentences.en: The ridge consists entirely of volcanic rock.
sentences.cn: 这处山脊完全由火山岩构成。

sentences.en: This is an entirely computer operated system which is very user friendly.
sentences.cn: 这个系统完全由电脑操控，非常好用。

sentences.en: This, I am sorry to say, is almost entirely wishful thinking.
sentences.cn: 我很遗憾，这几乎完全是一厢情愿的想法。

sentences.en: We are all entirely responsible for our actions, and for our reactions.
sentences.cn: 我们都对自己的行为和反应负全责。

sentences.en: We shall see that this is not entirely true.
sentences.cn: 我们会明白这并非全是真的。

trans.tran_en: completely and in every possible way
